description: Cross-sectional and longitudinal segmentation for brain structures like thalamus, brainstem, and hippo-amygdala.

structure.title: Structure
structure.description: Structure to segment. Options are: thalamus, brainstem, hippo-amygdala.

cross.title: Cross-sectional Subject
cross.description: Subject to segment in cross-sectional analysis.

long_base.title: Longitudinal Base Subject
long_base.description: Base subject for longitudinal analysis. Timepoints are extracted from the base-tps file.

sd.title: Subjects Directory
sd.description: Specify subjects directory (will override SUBJECTS_DIR env variable).

temp_dir.title: Temporary Directory
temp_dir.description: Use alternative temporary directory. This will get deleted unless --debug is enabled.

out_dir.title: Output Directory
out_dir.description: Use alternative output directory (only for cross-sectional). Default is the subject's `mri` directory.

threads.title: Number of Threads
threads.description: Number of threads to use. Defaults to 1.
